      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MorphologyChecker.checkMorphhology(SentenceList list, boolean checkPersonNow, boolean checkSentimentNow)
      This method iterates through the nouns in the MorphologyChecker.morphologyMap to determine if any sub-lemma can be identified as a sentiment or a person.
      void NamedEntityReader.readNamedEntities(SentenceList sentences)
      Given the filename and the text with NE-tags this keeps those words that are tagged as person or organisation.
      void MorphologyChecker.replaceLemma(SentenceList list, java.lang.String replacementLemma, java.lang.String key)
      This method is used once a sub-lemma has been identified as a person or sentiment expression.
      SentenceObj PresetSELocationModule.searchMatchingSentence(SentenceList sentences, java.lang.String sentenceId)
      Returns the matching sentence in the SentenceList given a sentenceId.
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type SentenceList 
      Constructor and Description
      PresetSELocationModule(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> SEsFromInput, SentenceList sentences, SentimentLex lex, boolean findSources, boolean findTargets, boolean ignoreLexicon, Module giModule)
      Constructor for PresetSELocationModule.
      SalsaAPIConnective(java.lang.String file, SentenceList sentenceList)
      Parses a Salsa XML file which represents a corpus by: a) creating a Corpus object from said Salsa XML file, b) extracting this Corpus object's Body (Salsa XML file minus the header), c) extracting an ArrayList of all Sentences from the Body, d) iterating over all Sentences and extracting their Graphs, e) creating ConstituencyTrees for all Graphs, f) assigning a ConstituencyTree to the corresponding SentenceObj in the SentenceList.
      SentimentChecker(SalsaAPIConnective salsaCon, SentenceList list, java.util.Set<Module> modules)

      SubtaskParser constructor.
